title: Business Intelligence Specialist
description:
InsightCore Analytics is Hiring a Business Intelligence Specialist (Full-Time)

InsightCore Analytics, a Paris-based firm, delivers BI solutions for clients in finance and retail. We’re seeking an Business Intelligence Specialist to drive data insights.

Role Overview
You’ll create BI solutions to optimize client strategies.

Key Tasks
- Develop BI reports with Power BI.
- Analyze data trends.
- Define reporting needs with clients.
- Optimize data models.
- Train clients on BI tools.
- Ensure data quality.
- Stay updated on BI trends.
- Prepare client presentations.
- Support project planning.
- Share team insights.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in BI, proficient in Power BI and SQL. Strong visualization and communication skills are essential, along with client-facing experience. A Bachelor’s degree in data science or a related field is required.

Why InsightCore?
We value data and collaboration. Our hybrid work model and training programs support growth in a supportive environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Pension plan
25 days of annual leave
Training budget
BI tools access
Team events

Join Us
Apply now to drive insights with InsightCore Analytics!

#InsightCoreCareers #BusinessIntelligence #HiringNow
